message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a unique opportunity to get a high-quality item at a competitive price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a reasonable offer, but I'm not willing to go above that.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $130. Can we meet somewhere in the middle of that and $160?
I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, and I'm willing to be flexible. I can meet you at $155, which is a bit above your target and below my minimum.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. I'd be willing to go up to $140. Can we meet at that price?
I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a profit. I can meet you at $145, which is a bit above your target and still below my minimum.
